title: Ticket #6233: Add -region flag
description:
We should add a -region flag to condor_annex, rather than forcing people to supply a whole slew of URLs. We should make sure this region flag also applies to the -setup and -check-setup commands, as well [as the create and update annex commands].

Deprecate the third -setup command argument (the CloudFormation URL) when this is done.
